productOverview.name: ShiftAI Scheduler
productOverview.tagline: AI-Driven Mobile Scheduling: Slash Overtime 30%+, Cover Peaks Effortlessly
productOverview.targetUsers: Non-technical managers of SMB service businesses (5-500 staff: cafes, spas, retail with walk-ins/appointments)
productOverview.valueProp: AI forecasts demand & optimizes shifts to cut labor costs 25-40%, maintain >90% coverage, with equitable, compliant mobile-first workflows.

features.name: Demand Forecasting
features.description: Prophet/LSTM models predict 15-min demand intervals over 7 days, incorporating multi-source data with 80-95% confidence bands.
inputs: Historical POS/sales CSV uploads (camera scan/mobile drag-drop)

features.name: Staff Optimization
features.description: OR-Tools/PuLP solver minimizes cost under constraints: skills, availability, rest (11h min), max 8h shifts, 10-20% no-show buffer, fuzzy skills matching, equitable rotation (bias-free via randomization/seeded fairness).

features.name: Interactive Scheduling
features.description: Touch-drag calendar for edits, multi-location views, real-time AI re-optimize.

features.name: Onboarding & Integrations
features.description: Wizard for quick setup, API/CSV imports, HR sync.

features.name: Analytics & Simulations
features.description: A/B vs manual, KPI dashboards, scenario testing (e.g., +50% surge).

uiMockups.description: Step-by-step mobile carousel: business type picker → staff CSV camera upload → rules setup.
Home with forecast peaks, generate button, upcoming alerts.
Weekly view with 15-min slots, drag-to-assign staff, color-coded skills/locations.
Sliders for scenarios (demand +50%, staff absence), instant re-run.
Charts for KPIs, A/B manual vs AI.

stack.frontend: React Native (Expo) for iOS/Android/PWA + FullCalendar/react-native-calendars for drag-drop
stack.backend: Python FastAPI + Celery for async AI jobs
stack.ai: Prophet/scikit-learn for forecasting, OR-Tools for optimization (Dockerized solvers)

technicalArchitecture.dataFlow: Mobile app uploads data → FastAPI endpoint triggers Celery job (forecast → optimize) → WebSocket/push updates UI → Offline sync via Realm/SQLite.

metricsAndROI.pilotExample: Cafe (50 cust/hr lunch): Forecast peak → 3 basic +1 advanced barista ($450 cost, 31% savings vs manual $650); zero understaffing, compliant rests.
